CHAPTER 244 Employees Generally

EDITOR’S NOTE:Former Codified Ordinances 244.43 set forth the Employee Policies and Procedures Manual and established fringe benefits for City employees. Ordinance 10-39 passed December 2, 2010, adopted an amended Employee Policy Manual as a separate Manual that is not contained in the Codified Ordinances. Copies of the Employee Policy Manual adopted by Ordinance 10-39, and any permitted amendment thereto, are on file in the office of the Clerk of Council.

244.00Policy manual. 244.01Reserved. 244.41Pick-up of employees PERS contribution.

244.43Identity Theft Prevention Program.
